text:
When we have multiple language versions on a website HubSpot automatically add *?hsLang=en*
Does someone remember how to avoid that behaviour on a link ? Is there a class to add to the link ?
Thanks
You can add the class `hs-skip-lang-url-rewrite` to an element and we will ski the rewrite
when i try to use the ‘fromjson’ filter on a custom field that will have json, it prevents me from publishing the custom module. How can I get around this?
The issue is that in the preview context, there’s no value for that contact field. You can do something like `{% if contact.parg_test_json_field %} ... {% endif %}`
Is there any way to get value of prev/next object of custom module in flexible column or using repeater option in custom module?
